แนะนำ Workflows: ระบบอัตโนมัติแบบ No-Code สำหรับข้อมูลเชิงลึกระดับ Data Scientist บน Blockchain

Introducing Workflows: No-Code Automation for Data-Scientist-Level Blockchain Insights

1/20/2026//Chainalysis Team
general
AI

Summary

TH

Chainalysis เปิดตัว 'Workflows' ซึ่งเป็นแพลตฟอร์มอัตโนมัติโดยไม่ต้องเขียนโค้ด ที่ช่วยให้ผู้ใช้ทั้งทางเทคนิคและไม่ใช่ทางเทคนิคสามารถวิเคราะห์ข้อมูลบล็อกเชนขั้นสูงได้ เครื่องมือนี้แปลงงานวิเคราะห์ข้อมูลที่ซับซ้อนให้กลายเป็นส่วนติดต่อที่กระชับและใช้งานง่าย โดยมีฟังก์ชันหลักคือวิเคราะห์เวลาและจำนวนการเงิน เครือข่ายนักข่าวกระทำผิดด้วยการวิเคราะห์พาร์ทเนอร์ร่วม และค้นหับั้งค์เลเตอร์และกลุ่มเป้าหมาย วิสัยทัศน์ของ Chainalysis คือขยายฟังก์ชันการทำงานนี้ไปสูงสุดหลายร้อยฟังก์ชันและรวมกับ AI เพื่อทำงานอัตโนมัติแบบเต็มระบบ ซึ่งจะเป็นอนาคตของอัตโนมัติในด้านข้อมูลบล็อกเชน

EN

Chainalysis has launched 'Workflows,' a no-code automation platform that enables both technical and non-technical users to perform advanced blockchain analysis without writing code. This tool transforms complex data science tasks into simple, fill-in-the-blanks interfaces, allowing users to uncover threat intelligence, identify illicit networks, and automate workflows with just a few clicks. Currently featuring powerful workflows like Timing & Amount Analysis, Threat Actor Network Expansion, and Targeted Wallet & Cluster Search, the platform aims to make every user as effective as a data scientist. Chainalytics envisions expanding to hundreds of no-code workflows and eventually integrating AI to orchestrate complex end-to-end tasks, representing the future of blockchain intelligence automation.

Key Points

  • Chainalysis launched 'Workflows' as a no-code automation platform for blockchain analysis
  • The tool enables both technical and non-technical users to perform advanced blockchain analysis without coding
  • Features include Timing & Amount Analysis, Threat Actor Network Expansion, and Targeted Wallet & Cluster Search
  • Chainalysis plans to expand to hundreds of no-code workflows and integrate AI for end-to-end automation in the future

Article

At its core, Chainalysis is a data company with a dataset that maps the global cryptocurrency ecosystem, providing unmatched intelligence on legitimate and illicit flows across blockchains. Our data is the benchmark for blockchain intelligence , trusted across the public and private sectors for investigations, compliance, and security. We’re known for the insights we surface about the crypto economy and illicit activity , and our long-term vision is to harness the power of this data for our customers’ missions and business needs. Today marks a major step forward in that vision with the launch of Workflows for Data Solutions. A year ago, we quietly rolled out access to Data Solutions (DS) to users — mostly technical data experts at sophisticated organizations — so that they could query our data to detect threat actors in their areas of responsibility (AORs) and automate their workflows. After encouraging feedback from those power users, we are now making these capabilities accessible to non-technical users. With Workflows, we aim to give every Chainalysis user the superpowers of an expert data scientist — the ability to uncover mission-relevant threat intelligence and automate complex workflows without writing a single line of code. Automated threat detection is here Proactive threat detection is one of the greatest promises of a more transparent financial system built on blockchains. Investigating one illicit crypto transaction can uncover an entire network of bad actors. Understanding the on-chain fingerprint of an illicit group can lead to the discovery of previously unknown activity. Until now, this work was entirely manual and time consuming. But as Coinbase demonstrated in their recent fentanyl sprint, Chainalysis DS helped them map and disrupt complex criminal ecosystems. Workflows in DS scales this kind of work by automating repeatable steps and surfacing relevant on-chain insights for any investigator. That automation reduces manual effort, saves time and ultimately helps teams become more proactive, efficient, and strategic in how they detect and disrupt threats. How Workflows works Workflows in DS brings interactive no-code experiences that guide users through advanced blockchain analysis with a simple, fill-in-the-blanks style interface. Users can now run complex analytical tasks in just a few clicks, without writing any SQL or Python. Techniques that previously required support from specialized technical experts can now be executed through intuitive, guided workflows, turning hours or days of work into moments with actionable insights. Technical users can still retain full SQL and Python access when they want it, while non-technical users gain unprecedented analytical independence. Entire organizations move faster, together. We are launching with a few powerful workflows, including: Timing & Amount Analysis : Narrow likely deposit/withdrawal matches from a service to help you identify transactions of interest faster. Threat Actor Network Expansion via Mutual Counterparty Analysis : Uncover the shared counterparties of hundreds of threat actors with a few clicks instead of manually sorting through thousands of counterparties. Targeted Wallet & Cluster Search : Find wallets that match precise threat actor fingerprints using a number of filters including exposure, transactional activity, and service characteristics. The future of Workflows We plan to expand to hundreds of no-code workflows over time. These mini applications will enable users to automate even their most complex tasks. We’re prioritizing outcomes our customers care about most, for example: Threat detection : disrupt sophisticated threat actors proactively by modeling their precise fingerprints and monitoring them Ecosystem-wide views: inform operational strategy with a holistic view of any threat area or ecosystem Bulk enrichment: enrich any dataset in your possession with Chainalysis intelligence whether it’s for tax, regulatory, compliance or investigative purposes Business insights: gather actionable insights on any token or particular type of on-chain activity … and much more See more detailed examples here of how organizations in the public and private sectors can leverage Workflows now and in the future. Our vision for Data Solutions is to give every Chainalysis user the superpowers of a data scientist. This vision rests on two pillars: Workflows and AI. Workflows are the building blocks for the most common analytical tasks; in the near future, our customers will be able to use AI to orchestrate and combine individual Workflows, which will automate any complex task end-to-end. We believe this integration of Workflows and AI represents the future of blockchain intelligence and automation.
